week he will step down as chief executive officer in favor of Google Inc. co-founder Larry Page and become executive chairman. Eric Schmidt is "committed to Google Inc. ," he told reporters at the Digital-Life-Design conference in Munich today. How long are you committed to doing what you're doing? As long as it's exciting, he said in response to a question about his plans. Eric Schmidt , 55, may be considering a career as a television host, the New York Post reported yesterday.
